attributes.action: public execution of the two men who murdered the soldier in London 22/05/13
attributes.additional_details: The two men who murdered the soldier in public, in front of a school, and then waited at the scene and attacked the police on 22nd of May 2013 should be publicly executed as a message to others that the UK will not stand for this. Preferably by some horrific medieval means. And probably tortured first.
